primevc.gui.core.ISkin

type
interface
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
primevc.gui.traits.IBehaving
Interface for a skin. Order of execution of methods of a skin: - IUIComponent creates skin - ISkin->constructor - createStates() - createChildren() - IUIComponent.createChildren() - IUIComponent -> ISkin.setupSkin()

Instance Variables

skinState(default,null) : primevc.gui.states.SkinStates

Instance Methods

childrenCreated() : Void

This method is called after the owner has created it's children. It can be used e.g. to place them in a different container or change their depts or values.
